missionDescription: Captain [[name]], Sterkborg Space Bank has recently suffered a major security breach, and organised thieves were able to steal large quantities of Space Diamonds. We would like to hire you to protect our properties around the galaxy, recover the Diamonds, and bring justice to those responsible. Of course, we pay very well.                                   Move to the cockpit at the front of the ship, and press 'E' at the console to begin flying your ship. Press 'E' again to stop flying.
